com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiButton

  • public class GuiButton
extends GuiContainer
    This GUI node is a button it will trigger all listeners when a mouse button is pressed.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

        Parameters:

        isPressedDown - true if the event was caused by a mouse being pressed down.
